name: Asteroid Babe
detailed_description:
Come relax and play at Asteroid Babe, a fully immersive VR Paradise where you can be entertained and interact with the Hottest Girls in the Galaxy--the Asteroid Babes.
Played by a Supermodel filled cast including Shantal Monique (Playboy, Maxim), Monifa Jansen (Miss Curacao Universe), and Rose (Cosplay Star) amongst others, the Asteroid Babes are sure to give you the relaxing, tantalizing getaway experience you need. Our characters were made using 2k scans, and our virtual environments are fully navigable, allowing you to travel around our environments using either walking or teleportation and interact with the virtual Asteroid Babes.

The Low Gravity Asteroid also hosts the most Popular Game Show across The Thousand Galaxies, SHOP OR DIE, where you are pitted against others in a multiplayer Shopathon to the death. The Arena is An Infamous Virtual Environment full of lethal dangers that has claimed more than a few lives. Play against others in 4 on 4 Battle Royale Style, or Face off 2 Vs 2. Power Ups summon Asteroid Babes who endow you with special abilities to help you survive the Arena and live another day in paradise.

This is a Virtual Reality Game Experience For the HTC Vive available on Steam.

short_description: This Floating VR Paradise Hosts a Multiplayer Shopathon to the Death in a Lethal Arena for the Galaxy’s Most Popular Virtual Reality Show.  Survive with the help of the Asteroid Babes and they’ll Entertain you in the Virtual Lounge, a getaway for fun and relaxation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K CPU @ 4.2GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17.10.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700K CPU @ 4.2GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 Ti

legal_notice: Asteroid Babes is produced and fully owned by Holocards LLC.  All copyright and content in this virtual game experience is owned by Holocards LLC
